overview:
LinguaTV offers a new and fascinating way for learning languages online with videos and educational games.

LinguaTV was formed in order to make learning languages easy, efficient and fun: The combination of educational content, innovative technology and social media. A simple, but successful concept, implemented in cooperation with experienced language trainers, media instructors, internet specialists, filmmakers and actors.

At the same time, the videos show special cultural aspects of communication and explain complex aspects of the language, such as the grammar, which is far easier with a video.
